title: Making a New ranked team
body:
SInce no one has offered me to join a team i have now taken upon myself to create my own.

What I am after are players that are in silver/gold/plat.
There are no Favourites in this so everyone can play in the team even when I may be at work, play together and have fun.

Flexibility for other positions are a must, even im trying to learn new spots and champs to this date,

Please add me JoshJackJJ to express your interest to me or comment below and ill get back to you ASAP.

replies.body: hey i am currently b2 but can show you i aint as bad, i just play rank for fun now with mates and we screw around a bit but ayye if your interested in having a norms with me and just playing around http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=kawaiikanpeki have a suss and shoot me up... play all roles, some better than others ;)

I can play all roles with the tiny little champ pool i have of 16 champs. I can play all roles as teemo, proficient teemo jgler/mid/top/adc/supp, been playing teemo since s3 on several accs. I am mastah of the 'mo.
